task.title: My First Task
task.shortdesc: The Laser D project requires performing certain tasks to ensure its successful completion.

prereq.p: Before processing discs, make sure you perform these tasks first:

ul.li: Collect a batch of discs from your library's collection.
Carry the CDs over to your workstation.
Select a case, open the plastic lid cover, and carefully remove the disc.
Insert the disc into the drive and run the SAS program.

context.p: The protocols involved in processing Laser D discs may seem mundane, but they are crucial in the migration of corporate document files.

step.cmd: Start the SAS program by clicking the "running man" button.
step.info: The program will extract all of the documents stored on the disc.

step.cmd: Wait for all of the documents to appear on Microsoft Windows, look for any corrupted files, and make a note of them in your notebook.

taskbody.result: You have adheared to the protocols for processing a disc, thus guaranteeing the safe migration of corporate document files.
